title: Degraded service
body:
Monitoring

  • We have rolled out a patch that should have solved the suspected issue. The systems are now under close monitoring. Jobs have been restarted and will be processed in the next few hours. (17:25 UTC — Aug 19)

Investigating

  • We have isolated the core issue and are preparing a patch to be rolled out soon. (16:25 UTC — Aug 19)

Investigating

  • We are experiencing a service level problem on app.qfield.cloud and have stopped the workers while we are investigating. Jobs are being accumulated and will be processed once the issue is resolved. (15:00 UTC — Aug 19)
